00123         osg::ref_ptr<SSAORendering> ssaoPPU_;

00153 class CustomResizeHandler : public osgGA::GUIEventHandler
00154 {
00155 public:
00156     CompositeViewer* viewer;
00157 
00158     CustomResizeHandler(CompositeViewer* v) : viewer(v)
00159     {
00160     }
00161 
00162     bool handle(const osgGA::GUIEventAdapter& ea,osgGA::GUIActionAdapter&)
00163     {
00164         switch(ea.getEventType())
00165         {
00166             case (osgGA::GUIEventAdapter::RESIZE):
00167             {
00168                 osgPPU::Camera::resizeViewport(0,0, ea.getWindowWidth(), ea.getWindowHeight(), viewer->getView(0)->getCamera());
00169                 viewer->getProcessor()->onViewportChange();
00170                 break;
00171             }
00172             default:
00173                 break;
00174         }
00175         return false;
00176     }
00177 };
